coreAttributes.name: Suspicious Truffle
coreAttributes.description: A large black truffle. It has a rich, luxurious musk. Seems to shudder and shake on its own...
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(npc.getBody().getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FUNGUS)

[style.colourDisabled([npc.NameIsFull] already a fungal creature, so nothing happens...)]

#ELSEIF(npc.getBody().getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_SLIME)

[style.colourDisabled([npc.NameIsFull] a slime, so nothing happens...)]

#ELSEIF(npc.getBody().getBodyMaterial()!=BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH)

[style.colourDisabled([npc.NameIsFull] an elemental, so nothing happens...)]

#ELSE [#npc.setBodyMaterial(BODY_MATERIAL_FUNGUS)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] gingerly [npc.verb(poke)] at the truffle, before giving it an experimental sniff. Suddenly, the truffle bursts open, dusting [npc.name] with spores!
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(offer)] the glowing seed to [npc2.name]. When [npc2.name] curiously [npc2.verb(pokes)] it, it bursts, dusting [npc2.name] with spores!
